scripts.start: firebase deploy && GAME_VERSION=`git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'%H'` nodemon --watch server --harmony-async-await server/server.js
scripts.deploy-live: now --alias -e GAME_VERSION=`git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'%H'` && curl https://api.rollbar.com/api/1/deploy/ -F access_token=22fca22d3936434eb8b69cc0c453d040 -F environment=production -F revision=`git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'%H'` -F local_username=`whoami` && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy-testing: now -e GAME_VERSION=`git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'%H'` && curl https://api.rollbar.com/api/1/deploy/ -F access_token=22fca22d3936434eb8b69cc0c453d040 -F environment=testing -F revision=`git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'%H'` -F local_username=`whoami` && firebase deploy
